        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_fc164d573fe165b631b01016789990fbc89c1a70</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Graphical data on stopping distances vs. vehicle speed</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Graphische Daten bezüglich der Stppwege gegen 
Trägergeschwindigkeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Données graphiques sur des distances d'arrêt 
contre la vitesse de véhicule</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dados gráficos em distâncias de parada contra a 
velocidade do veículo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dati grafici sulle distanze di arresto contro 
velocità del veicolo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραφικά στοιχεία όσον αφορά την παύση των αποστάσεων
εναντίον της ταχύτητας οχημάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Datos gráficos sobre distancias que paran contra 
velocidad del vehículo</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These line graphs show the relationship between stopping distances (thinking distance [left] and braking distance [right]) and the vehicle speed.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">speed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">braking distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">deceleration</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">stopping distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thinking distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses zeigen Zeile Diagramme das Verhältnis 
zwischen Stppwegen (denkender Abstand [ nach links ] und der bremsende
Abstand [ recht ]) und die Trägergeschwindigkeit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces graphes par ligne montrent le rapport entre 
les distances d'arrêt (distance de pensée [ à gauche ] et distance 
de freinage [ droite ]) et la vitesse de véhicule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este a linha gráficos mostra o relacionamento 
entre distâncias de parada (distância pensando [ à esquerda ] e 
distância freando [ direita ]) e a velocidade do veículo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafici lineari mostra il rapporto fra le 
distanze di arresto (distanza pensante [ a sinistra ] e distanza di 
frenaggio [ di destra ]) e la velocità del veicolo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι γραφικές παραστάσεις γραμμών εμφανίζουν τη 
σχέση μεταξύ της παύσης των αποστάσεων (απόσταση σκέψης [ 
αριστερά ] και απόσταση φρεναρίσματος [ σωστή ]) και της 
ταχύτητας οχημάτων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este la línea gráficos muestra el lazo entre las
distancias que paran (distancia de pensamiento [ a la izquierda ] y 
distancia que frena [ derecha ]) y la velocidad del vehículo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschwindigkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">bremsender Abstand</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
